name: Dragon Treasure (itch)
description:
This is a self-study project: the videogame is a single level FPS where you have to fight against enemies to catch a treasure!

  • Player with fps controller and weapons
  • Ammo system
  • Ammo pickups in the map
  • Player game UI with health, weapon specific reticle and weapon remaining ammos
  • Monster enemy, with close range attack, animations and sfx
  • Win statue to win the game
  • Pause, Win and Game Over UIs
  • Game stats after winning the game: defeated enemies and picked up ammos count
  • Custom nature "handmade" terrain
  • Main menu and main level scenes

Creative commons 0 sounds thanks to https://freesound.org/
